subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Into his fifth year as the Texans starting quarterback, David Carr’s tenure has been troubled. He has been sacked 228 times, and his miscues have led to frequent booing by Houston fans.
snippet: Into his fifth year as the Texans starting quarterback, David Carr’s tenure has been troubled. He has been sacked 228 times, and his miscues have led to frequent booing by Houston fans.
